rules_text:
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to an opponent, draw a card.
Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 3 or greater, roll a d6. That many target creatures can't block this turn. If the result is 6, this creature can't be blocked this turn instead.
notes: Whenever you cast a spell, if it has mana value 3 or greater, roll a d6. Up to X target creatures can't block this creature this turn, where X is the result. If that spell was mana value 6 or greater, instead, this creature can't be blocked.
